title: Incremental Static Regeneration (ISR)
subject: Next.js
theory: ISR allows updating static pages after build time. By setting a `next: { revalidate: 60 }` option, Next.js rebuilds the page in the background after 60 seconds.

examples.explanation: Best of both worlds: Speed of SSG, Freshness of SSR.

interview_questions.question: How ISR works?
interview_questions.answer: Serves stale content while regenerating new content in background.
